title: The Walking Dead
overview: Based on the comic book series of the same name, The Walking Dead tells the story of a small group of survivors living in the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse.

episodes.title: Seed
episodes.overview: As the world grows more dangerous and Lori's pregnancy advances, Rick locates a potentially safe haven.

episodes.title: Sick
episodes.overview: A life hangs in the balance; the group deals with a threat to their new surroundings.

episodes.title: Walk with Me
episodes.overview: After witnessing an accident, Andrea and Michonne are introduced to a new community of survivors. As conflicts arise with their new acquaintances, a decision must be made.

episodes.title: Killer Within
episodes.overview: The group is severed, placing lives in jeopardy. Merle has a request for the Governor. Meanwhile the prison doesn't seem to be a place as secure as they thought.

episodes.title: Say the Word
episodes.overview: Rick struggles after another loss. Michonne is suspicious of the Governor.

episodes.title: Hounded
episodes.overview: Michonne makes a decision about Woodbury; Glenn and Maggie go on a run; Rick struggles.

episodes.title: When the Dead Come Knocking
episodes.overview: The Governor presses for information. A new guest arrives at the prison, forcing Rick's hand.

episodes.title: Made to Suffer
episodes.overview: Andrea steps up when the people of Woodbury are thrown into uncharted territory. A new threat arises at the prison.

episodes.title: The Suicide King
episodes.overview: After the invasion of Woodbury by Rick’s group, Daryl and Merle are captured by The Governor. Rick decides the fate of Tyreese’s group.

episodes.title: Home
episodes.overview: As the group debates their next course of action, Rick wanders after a lost friend. After helping another group of survivors flee a group of walkers, Daryl and Merle begin to have second thoughts about leaving the prison. The Governor cedes leadership of Woodbury to Andrea and makes plans to punish those responsible for the chaos.

episodes.title: I Ain't a Judas
episodes.overview: Rick and the group are forced to make a decision now that their safety is no longer guaranteed. Andrea feels uncomfortable now that Woodbury has become a police state.

episodes.title: Clear
episodes.overview: Since they are outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick undertakes a mission to get more weapons.

episodes.title: Arrow on the Doorpost
episodes.overview: Rick and the Governor contemplate a peace treaty.

episodes.title: Prey
episodes.overview: The Governor chases a fleeing dissenter; while the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his plans.

episodes.title: This Sorrowful Life
episodes.overview: Rick and the group are faced with a serious problem. If they want a truce with the Governor, they will have to make a huge sacrifice.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Tombs
episodes.overview: Rick and the others consider the defense of the prison as the Governor's impending attack looms.

episodes.title: What Lies Ahead
episodes.overview: Rick and the group leave Atlanta and encounter a threat on the highway the likes of which they've never seen. Elsewhere, the group search for a missing person.

episodes.title: Bloodletting
episodes.overview: Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get needed medical supplies.

episodes.title: Save the Last One
episodes.overview: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

episodes.title: Cherokee Rose
episodes.overview: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice which leads to unusual behavior and self-distancing. The rest of the group tries to hang on somewhere between living to die and dying to live.

episodes.title: Chupacabra
episodes.overview: Concerned for their safety, the group makes a plan – one that Hershel disagrees with adamantly. He makes it clear the group is fine to stay for now, but not indefinitely.

episodes.title: Secrets
episodes.overview: Secrets are told and secrets are revealed. Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world’s new reality. Andrea comes out of her shell. Everyone is becoming more and more aware that “everything is food for something.”

episodes.title: Pretty Much Dead Already
episodes.overview: Hershel sets a deadline. All secrets are out in the open. Glenn stands up for himself and Shane takes charge.

episodes.title: Nebraska
episodes.overview: Rick and the others try to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.

episodes.title: Triggerfinger
episodes.overview: Rick, Hershel and Glen are trapped and fight to survive; Shane finds Lori in danger.

episodes.title: 18 Miles Out
episodes.overview: Rick and Shane are in conflict over the fate of an outsider; Andrea helps Hershel's daughter face a crucial decision.

episodes.title: Judge, Jury, Executioner
episodes.overview: Rick sides with Shane causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity; Carl's actions have unintended consequences.

episodes.title: Better Angels
episodes.overview: Someone dangerous may be loose near the farm; Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn keep the group safe.

episodes.title: Beside the Dying Fire
episodes.overview: Rick and Carl find the farm in jeopardy; the group is split up in the chaos; Rick's leadership is questioned.

episodes.title: Days Gone Bye
episodes.overview: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane, whom he meets along the way, help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

episodes.title: Guts
episodes.overview: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers. The group dynamic devolves from accusations to violence, as Rick must confront an enemy far more dangerous than the undead.

episodes.title: Tell It to the Frogs
episodes.overview: After returning to the camp with the department store survivors and an emotional reunion with his wife and son, Rick decides to go against Shane's advice and go back to Atlanta for Merle Dixon and his dropped bag of guns accompanied by Merle's younger brother, Darryl Dixon, as well as Glenn and T-Dog.

episodes.title: Vatos
episodes.overview: While still in search of Merle, the group tries to retrieve the bag of guns but are attacked by several living men who are also after the weapons. The group manages to grab the injured attacker; however, several of the attackers escape and take Glenn hostage. Back at camp a large group of walkers venture up the hill and take the survivors by surprise.

episodes.title: Wildfire
episodes.overview: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack on the camp. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision.

episodes.title: TS-19
episodes.overview: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor, but all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.

episodes.title: Season 1 Sneak Peak
episodes.overview: A preview of the upcoming series.

episodes.title: The Making of The Walking Dead
Torn Apart (1) A New Day
episodes.overview: Hannah awakens to find her kids missing after a violent car accident.

episodes.title: Torn Apart (2) Family Matters
episodes.overview: Hannah has an emotional reunion with her kids and seeks refuge in her ex-husband Andrew’s home. While tending to her wounds, Hannah and Andrew try to make sense of the chaotic new world that surrounds them.

episodes.title: Torn Apart (3) Domestic Violence
episodes.overview: Judy’s effort to save a stranger leads to a deadly encounter with Andrew.

episodes.title: Torn Apart (4) Neighborly Advice
episodes.overview: Andrew goes to his neighbor Palmer’s basement in search of guns and supplies. Once there, the two have a man to man conversation and finally come to an understanding with one another.

episodes.title: Torn Apart (5) Step Mother
episodes.overview: Hannah and Judy struggle for control of the children.

episodes.title: Torn Apart (6) Everything Dies
episodes.overview: The family makes a desperate attempt to get to safety amid a rapidly growing swarm of walkers.

episodes.title: Inside The Walking Dead: Days Gone By
episodes.overview: Behind the scenes of Episode 1

episodes.title: Inside The Walking Dead: Guts
episodes.overview: Behind the scenes of episode 2

episodes.title: Inside The Walking Dead: Tell it to the Frogs
episodes.overview: Behind the scenes of Episode 3

episodes.title: Inside The Walking Dead: What Lies Ahead
episodes.overview: Andrew Lincoln and his costars from The Walking Dead talk about developing their characters, a wrenching storyline, and more zombie killing in the thrilling season 2 premiere.

episodes.title: Inside The Walking Dead: Save the Last One
Inside The Walking Dead: Cherokee Rose
Inside The Walking Dead: Pretty Much Dead Already
Inside The Walking Dead: 18 Miles Out
Inside The Walking Dead: Judge, Jury, Executioner.
Inside The Walking Dead: Better Angels
Inside The Walking Dead: Beside the Dying Fire
Cold Storage: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Chase seeks refuge from a horde of walkers in an abandoned storage facility. However, he may not be the only survivor left there.

episodes.title: Cold Storage: Keys to the Kingdom
episodes.overview: B.J. gives Chase a tour of the storage facility. But despite his affable demeanor, B.J. may be hiding a dark secret.

episodes.title: Cold Storage: The Chosen Ones
episodes.overview: In order to keep the electricity flowing, Chase must venture into the darkness to help B.J. reset the generators.

episodes.title: Cold Storage: Parting Shots
episodes.overview: Chase discovers B.J.’s dark secret. While attempting to escape, Chase is confronted by B.J. and the two engage in a final standoff.
